Statistics.DateRangeSubtitle: Consult the saloon data in a range of time

Tour.Dashboard: Here is where the app functionalities are. We can access to them with a simple click
Tour.Sidebar: The same way as dashboard, we have the different app functionalities in our sidebar, but we added 'Statistics'
Tour.Profile: From here we can access to our personal data, do the tour again or logout
Tour.Calendar:
From here we can see, add and edit the appointments that we have in our saloon. 
We have day, week and month calendar views available. 
To add an appointment we should drag from the start time to the finish time. 
To edit an appointment we should click and edit the fields.
To delete an appointment, we should click on the event and select the button 'delete'
Tour.CalendarList: In this window we can see the scheduled appointments that we have the selected day
Tour.Customers: From here we can access to customer, services and products data, as we can edit it, show details, and show history (in case of the customers) or delete from the database
Tour.CustomersHistory: This view is exclusive to the customer section. From here we will see the history of the customer appointments
Tour.CustomerInfo: Here we will see the customer, service or product information that is selected
Tour.CustomerAdd: To add costumers, services or products, we click on that button and fill the inputs
Tour.Cash: Here we can do the appointments payments and open/close the cash register
Tour.CashFilters: Using this functionality we can filter the appointments
Tour.Statistics: See your saloon statistics according to the time range that you should specify
Tour.Configuration: In this view you can edit the characteristics of your saloon and change to your favourite language

Cash.MoneyStart: With how many cash you want to start?
Cash.CloseCashMoney: You want to close the cash register with cash?
Cash.CashOpenedAgain: Today's cash register has opened again
Cash.ConfirmPayment: Confirm the payment of this appointment
